The BBC has apologised after receiving hundreds of complaints for incorrectly describing Paul Mescal as a British actor during its Oscar nominations coverage.
The error occurred in on-screen text on… [+557 chars]

articles.author: Armagh News,Mark Bain
articles.title: Co Armagh born presenter loses role in major cull at BBC News - Belfast Telegraph
articles.description: One of Northern Ireland’s best known TV journalists is among 10 familiar faces to lose out as BBC News in London cuts back its broadcasting team.
